name: Dorothy_Doak
text:
Dorothy Doak
Dorothy Doak was a cashier at the Twin Peaks Savings and Loan.
Biography
Doak was on duty when a bomb detonated in the bank's basement vault, killing Andrew Packard, Pete Martell, and Dell Mibbler and severely injuring Audrey Horne. She herself was not injured but nonetheless was taken to the hospital for observation.
Behinde the scene
 
Doak is possibly intended to be the sleeping clerk seen in the vault in "Episode 29." However, The Secret History of Twin Peaks states that Doak was working at the front desk upstairs at the time of the explosion.
